Articles.Content:
@JewelShisen - I agree with everything you've said here... and I'd like to stick with the HL GUI.  Trying to fly by hand just doesn't look like fun to me.  Any idea when you guys will be able to incorporate Nightingale's fixes into your code?  Not trying to rush you, but I installed CC a few days ago before I knew about the conflict and then accepted some CC contracts, and now I have a stranded airship on the island.  I've tried flying it off by hand, and that never ends well, and I don't want to uninstall CC because that will wreck havoc on the game.

Thanks!
I miss the UI, it has been very difficult to fly these airships. Airships set their ballast by altitude and pressure, the auto level feature helped with that a lot.
Update just went live to bring the mod in line with 1.2.1 and to remove all support for the old Toolbar Mod.

3 hours ago, JewelShisen said:

Update just went live to bring the mod in line with 1.2.1 and to remove all support for the old Toolbar Mod.

which old toolbar mod? blizzy's? why?

1 minute ago, Deimos Rast said:

which old toolbar mod? blizzy's? why?

Because it is no longer needed by the mod since the stock toolbar was introduced.

23 minutes ago, JewelShisen said:

Because it is no longer needed by the mod since the stock toolbar was introduced.

a fair point, but you can't hide buttons on the stock toolbar or reorganize it.

what's done is done though.
So how do i control the airship now? Without the UI i have no idea how to fly...

Just now, Deizelpunk said:

So how do i control the airship now? Without the UI i have no idea how to fly...

 

You can get to the UI via the stock toolbar. All we removed was the old toolbar MOD.

Nevermind, much simpler than I thought.

Yeah my bad i was using the heisenberg part pack, didnt realise i needed one of your parts for the Ai. Really happy this is updated for 1.2 tho man!

51 minutes ago, Deizelpunk said:

Nevermind, much simpler than I thought.

Yeah my bad i was using the heisenberg part pack, didnt realise i needed one of your parts for the Ai. Really happy this is updated for 1.2 tho man!

 

Interesting... I will have to talk to Dunclaw and find out why...
It will only display a toolbar if at least one part on the active vessel contains an HLEnvelopePart module. I haven't looked at th Heisenberg pack to see what those parts define.

I'm getting a weird bug. Whenever I place an envelope in the SPH, sometimes I can't surface attach or click on it after it's been placed. Usually done after loading a craft from the menu. Something appears to be wrong with the collider, there's errors saying; "Non convex mesh collider with non-kinematic rigidbody is no longer supported in Unity 5, If you want to use a non-convex mesh either make the RigidBody kinematic or remove the rigidbody component"

Edited December 11, 2016 by oniontrain

5 hours ago, oniontrain said:

I'm getting a weird bug. Whenever I place an envelope in the SPH, sometimes I can't surface attach or click on it after it's been placed. Usually done after loading a craft from the menu. Something appears to be wrong with the collider, there's errors saying; "Non convex mesh collider with non-kinematic rigidbody is no longer supported in Unity 5, If you want to use a non-convex mesh either make the RigidBody kinematic or remove the rigidbody component"

Weird... I'll have to take a look but as far as I know all the new parts are using convex mesh colliders
It's the basic 'airship envelope' I'm having the issue with. It also looks like the nodes on the 2 crew gondola are all facing 90 degrees off as well.
Is it one of the old ones or one of mine? Also the gondola is one of Spanner's parts but if it is just a node issue then I will see what I can do to fix it.

51 minutes ago, JewelShisen said:

Is it one of the old ones or one of mine? Also the gondola is one of Spanner's parts but if it is just a node issue then I will see what I can do to fix it.

 A lot if not most of the original envelopes have dodgy or no colliders at all, they  all need exporting and re importing through an updated unity. It's something i can do if you'd like.

On 12/12/2016 at 6:39 AM, JewelShisen said:

Also the gondola is one of Spanner's parts

I'm going to port my parts over to unity 5 and as a result I'll be redoing all the nodes and adding a lot more using the NODE method of defined transforms, I'll be doing this over the next couple of weeks and will push the update parts as soon as I'm done
Hello everyone, esp. Jewel! I see the reports of this mod being dead are greatly exaggerated.

6 minutes ago, Hooligan Labs said:

Hello everyone, esp. Jewel! I see the reports of this mod being dead are greatly exaggerated.

Yes indeed good sir~!

Hi well a crap night for me is once again a good night for mods and it's all done fully ported to unity 5 , with some new little tweaks and more nodes that you'll ever need arranged in rows   along the lower center line and either side of each envelope,  also added a row of nodes in the cargo bay, and some new light animations for the pod and bay.   Will be testing some more  and adding some more goodies to the IVA . Should be ready later today or early tomorrow

Spoiler

That is a nice airship, Spanner! Glad to see new textures going onto the airships. It's weird to come back years later and see most things look the same!

I'd just like to add a few comments of my own, from poking around the internet about this mod...

  • Maybe take down the Curse page? It's still the top result for KSP airships, and it's confusing if you are no longer using it.
  • The next result after that is something like "Is the airship mod cheating"? Which is probably a lot my fault, but has that ever been addressed?

26 minutes ago, Hooligan Labs said:

That is a nice airship, Spanner! Glad to see new textures going onto the airships. It's weird to come back years later and see most things look the same!

I'd just like to add a few comments of my own, from poking around the internet about this mod...

  • Maybe take down the Curse page? It's still the top result for KSP airships, and it's confusing if you are no longer using it.
  • The next result after that is something like "Is the airship mod cheating"? Which is probably a lot my fault, but has that ever been addressed? 

Working on taking down the curse page now.

As for the cheating thing I think that has to do largely with the fact that the mod doesn't use up any resources at the moment.
@Hooligan Labs Nice to see you saying hi!. Thanks to you and @JewelShisen, we get to fly airships around. Definitely loads of fun.
Ok so ALL Hooligan Labs projects have now been deleted from Curse.

29 minutes ago, Hooligan Labs said:

That is a nice airship, Spanner! Glad to see new textures going onto the airships. It's weird to come back years later and see most things look the same!

Thanks, i appreciate that coming from the godfather of Kerbal Airships,  though he appears  as i was just about to mention that Angel-125 Hiesenbergs knock spots off my attempt, seriously next level stuff,   and RE it all being the same, i tried to change it but they changed it back   that was when i too thought it was dead, well it was at the time, and brought it back to life in 1.0.5, and then i found out it wasn't actually dead really more in hibernation damnit. Regardless i do love a bit of drifting about, cheers
